entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT: Invalid handling of `nosinglewarnassembly` #93819
  • Disposal of System.Threading.RateLimiting.ConcurrencyLease #93808

Closed

  • GC slows down use of multiple instances of LinkedList and SortedSet in parallel environment #93745
  • AVX512: Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlogq #84534
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: InlineArrayAttribute #61135
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Interlocked intrinsic improvements #93821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add RequiresProcessIsolation to R2RDumpTests #93820
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Optimize "X == Y" to "(X ^ Y) == 0 for SIMD #93818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose BitConverter APIs for Int128 and UInt128 #93817
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: stop creating gc poll blocks in morph #93816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve performance of UnmanagedMemoryStream #93812
    area-System.IO
  • Switch remaining tests using StandaloneApp project to use pre-built asset #93810
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Abstract out LocalBuilder, emit Locals with new ILGenerator #93809
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • JIT: Fix GenTreeCall::Equals virtual kind comparison #93813
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Optimize JsonContent fast path #93759
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] NaN-box float arguments #93665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add common parent for frozen objects #93773
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Stable branding for .NET 8 GA #93807
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
